text: (he nabee!) ve aapase pralay ke vishay mein prashn karate hain ki vah kab aayegee? kah do ki usaka gyaan to mere paalanahaar ke paas hai, use usake samay par vahee prakaashit kar dega. vah aakaashon tatha dharatee mein bhaaree hogee, tumapar akasmaat aa jaayegee. vah aapase aise prashn kar rahe hain, jaise ki aap usee kee khoj mein lage hue hon. aap kah den ki usaka gyaan allaah hee ko hai. parantu[1] adhikaansh log is (tathy) ko nahin jaanate
